channel.title: Using Foxtrot 718 Client NEED HELP CHANGING IP!
channel.description:
i'm pretty new to coding but i do have an issue my friend is running a Rune eve v3 source and he is port forwarded and everything is working fine. its just having a friend connect is the issue.
I've tried using the foxtrot client and chaining the IP in Loader.java then when i compile i get the error
"error_game_invalidhost"
i've even tried to just change anything that said "127.0.0.1" and i still get that error.
when i connect locally it shows where my cache is located but then when i change the IP and compile and run it just shows the same error again IM STUCK can someone help? :(
